This category contains articles related to workflows. 
A Workflow is a set of repeatable steps used to automate, review, and approve processes within the system. 
Workflows are created through the 
Global Settings
 tab and can be associated with any 
entity
 within the system.
Pages in category ‘Workflows’
The following 2 pages are in this category, out of 2 total.

Creating a workflow with scheduled reminders
